Service Details: - Provides services aimed at reducing cardiovascular risk factors and enhancing the health of individuals in the Central Okanagan- Provides risk factor modification through education and exercise- Helps improve fitness level, functional capacity and quality of life- Exercising in our clinically supervised environment ensures the utmost patient safety through close monitoring of heart rate, blood pressure, and telemetry- Offers a variety of programs and tailors each exercise session to meet the needs and goals of the individual- Focuses on cardiac risk factors, healthy eating, exercise guidelines, goal setting, stress and relaxation and understanding medications- Participants are strongly encouraged to have a partner attend the education classes with you at no extra charge
Eligibility: Appropriate C.O.A.C.H participants are those who have experienced or managing: Heart Attack, Atrial Fibrillation, Angioplasty/Stenting, Cardiac Arrest, Open Heart Surgery, Medically Managed Heart Disease
Cost: Program ; Fees vary; please visit our website or call for more information
Address & Map: 2622 Pandosy St, #204Kelowna, BC     V1Y 1V6View MapQuest Map
Accessibility: Not Accessible - Located on second floor; no elevator available
